text: Xianzai, an la yi jianqing nimen de fudan, yinwei ta zhidao nimen shang youxie boruo, suoyi, jiaru nimen zhong you yibai ge jianren zhe [zhu], tamen jiang neng zhansheng erbai ren; jiaru nimen zhong you yiqian ren, tamen feng'an la zhi ming jiang neng zhansheng erqian ren. An la yu jianren zhe tong zai.
